elements.name: Verify if a registered user can view and add the comments of a Top News in BBC News web Application

steps.name: A User navigates to the BBC News page and sign in using following details

steps.name: The user clicks on the comment icon of a Top News in the main page and lands on the article page
The user scroll down and wait for "5" seconds for the comments to display
User can join the conversation and add comments to the article

steps.name: The user clicks on the comment icon of a Top News in the main page and lands on the article page
The user scroll down and wait for "5" seconds for the comments to display
The user is instructed to Sign in to Comment, reply and react to the article

name: Verify the viewing of comments in BBC News Web Application
